titleStmt.title: The prophecie of Agabus, concerning a generall famine to come vpon the worlde: togither with a beneuolence for the most distressed: / set out by Peter Barker minister at Stoure-Paine..
titleStmt.author: Barker, Peter, preacher of Gods word.

notesStmt.note: Printer's ornament on t.p., initials throughout.
Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
